EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-18-Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-04.EMAIL - Ma
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP: Los Angeles Kings vs Canadiens
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're looking forward a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey as the Los Angeles Kings take on the Montreal Canadiens. Will you join us with Cisco and your technology peers on October 18th? Los Angeles Kings vs Montreal Canadiens <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
Where: Staples Center 1111 S. Figueroa, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Wednesday, October 18th 7:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-v-canadiens/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
